description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.N03BtRvjX9TeHRa4]{Warrior (Bard Muse)}

Trigger A creature within your reach uses an auditory effect, manipulate action, or move action; makes a ranged attack; or leaves a square during its move action.

Requirements You are affected by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Inspire Courage}.

You bellow a ferocious call to arms, inspiring yourself to lash out at a foe. Make a melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the action is disrupted.
